Resources

Setting up P2P connection between raspberry pi’s

Used P2P connection as described in ubiquity guide here. Used a physical netgear router to assign IP addresses.

Hotspot

Followed this guide. Was not successful.

Ubiquity map API - link

Troubleshooting:

Issue : Raspberry Pi uses ethernet as default interface device to access internet instead of wifi - Solution:

Specifically: Check default default route with

  netstat -rn

Then delete default route

  sudo route del default

Add new default route

sudo route add default gw 172.20.10.1

Issue: unable to update raspberry pi - Solution

This site is open source. Improve this page.
